testcase.name: Data_for_comparison
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to home page.................................................passed Then click on popup message and cookies button..............................passed And click on the box next to rows and select the value "20".................passed And capture all the contents under name and price rows......................passed And click on the "Filters"..................................................passed And click on Algorithm as "Algorithm" then select Pow.......................passed And click on Add filter as "Add filter".....................................passed Then toggle Mineable on new window..........................................passed And select the All Cryptocurrencies as "All Cryptocurrencies"...............passed And click on Coins as "Coins"...............................................passed And select Price and change the value "100" and "10000".....................passed When click Apply filter as "Apply filter" then Show results as "Show results".passed And compare page contents to before filter page content.....................passed
